casebody.data:
Elizabeth Hall, Respondent v. Mary Sexton, Appellant. Decided March 6, 1888. Appeal by defendant from an order continuing a temporary order of injunction. Joseph P. Fallon, for appellant. Francis C. Reed, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Truax, J.

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed with $10 costs to abide the event.
